DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of Phase III lots of the CYD dengue vaccine in a pediatric population in Malaysia. Primary Objectives: - To describe the safety (in terms of solicited and unsolicited adverse events) of the CYD dengue vaccine in all subjects after each dose. - To describe the antibody response to each dengue virus serotype post-Dose 2 and post-Dose 3
DOC.brief_title: Study of a Tetravalent Dengue Vaccine in Healthy Children Aged 2 to 11 Years in Malaysia
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy participants aged 2 to 11 years will receive 3 vaccinations at pre-determined schedules and will be followed-up for at least 6 months after the last vaccination.
